thread.title: Tim and Sam Brown
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Tim and Sam Brown

author: Tim and Sam Brown
title: Tim and Sam Brown
text: I had the opportunity to work with a fantasy young woman today, who was a bright and very valuable part of the management team and it was her mission to exceed my expectations when it came to fixing errors on behalf of a newer salesperson that made too many promises. This young manager did more than bend over backwards AND spend countless minutes on the phone with me and others, as well as run around her store, trying to make sure that my husband and I had an incredible experience buying our first set of brand new furniture! Thank you for making my day much better, Devon! You are truly incredible!
